message.original: 海岸は植生、魔物の種類とも平原とは異なる 特に多いのはハ―ピー、 そしてリザードマンなど水棲型
message.translation: The creatures who lurk here are much different then that of the plains. Harpies are plentiful. And Lizardmen stalk close to the water.

message.original: ブリア海岸南部は北部とは異なり 危険度が高い 水竜の目撃例も、多々
message.translation: Unlike the northern part of Breya, rumor has it, that a sea drake was once spotted there.

message.original: 漂流船の発見時は、速やかに検分を
message.translation: If we find a beached ship, it would be best to inspect it.

message.original: 波音は、精神衛生にも効果的――
message.translation: The melody of the tides, is calming to the mind.

message.original: 海岸部の情報収集であれば、 ローテスへの立ち寄りを勧める
message.translation: As far as coastal information gathering is concerned, I encourage you to stop by Rotes Village. Im sure they will have helpful information.
